frontmatter.title: ColorCompatibility Library
frontmatter.staticPreview: I wrote previously about a technique I use in Trestle and CIFilter.io to support iOS 12 and lower while still using system provided, dark-mode accessible colors...
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I [wrote previously](/blog/dark-mode-uicolor-compatibility) about a technique I use in [Trestle](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/trestle-the-new-sudoku/id1300230302?mt=8) and [CIFilter.io](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cifilter-io/id1457458557?mt=8) to support iOS 12 and lower while still using system provided, dark-mode accessible colors...
